IssuerProfile.uniqueIdentifierCaption: This ‘key’ represents you as a Data Custodian within SOURSD. This is unique to you! Any time SOURSD sends information to you, or activates a callback, this identifier will be sent along with the payload. Meaning you can always trust the source of information.
IssuerProfile.idvtDescription: This is handled by a third party Identification Document Verification Technology (IDVT) service.
IssuerProfile.getError: Unable to get the list of users

ProfileOrganisation.title: Profile
ProfileOrganisation.companyNotValidPopup: Your organisation has not been validated. This could be related to the information you've entered (i.e. company number). If you believe this message to be in error please contact us at  <contactLink></contactLink>
ProfileOrganisation.companyValidatingPopup: Your organisation is currently being checked against records held by Companies House
ProfileOrganisation.patchUserError: There was a problem updating your user details. Please try again or contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>

Form.name: Name
Form.whatIsDpstkOdsCode: The Data Security and Protection Toolkit is an online self-assessment tool that all organisations must use if they have access to NHS patient data and systems.
Form.dpoOrHrRequiredInvalid: At least one of these contacts is requured
Form.nameRequiredInvalid: Lead applicant name is a required field
Form.firstNameRequiredInvalid: First name is a required field
Form.lastNameRequiredInvalid: Last name is a required field
Form.emailFormatInvalid: Email must be a valid address
Form.contactEmailRequiredInvalid: Contact email is a required field
Form.contactEmailFormatInvalid: Contact email must be a valid address
Form.passwordLengthInvalid: Password should be between {minLength} and {maxLength} characters
Form.passwordFormatInvalid: Password should contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number
Form.otpPasscodeRequiredInvalid: OTP passcode is a required field
Form.confirmPasswordRequiredInvalid: Confirm password is a required field
Form.tscsRequiredInvalid: Terms and conditions must be accepted
Form.recaptchaError: You must prove you are not a robot
Form.companyNumberFormatInvalid: Company number is not in the correct format
Form.address1RequiredInvalid: Line 1 of the address is required
Form.orcIdFormatInvalid: Orc id should follow the format 0000-0000-0000-0000
Form.agreeTermsAndConditions: I accept the terms and conditions
Form.whatIsTheOrcId: Your ORCiD is a value which identifies you to Data Custodians (although in general anyone) and provides information to them such as your research outputs and activities. If you don't have one of these you can signup at https://orcid.org/register. Although it is recommended to provide this, it is not required for the registry, however it is required for the content scrape.

SignupForm.title: Sign Up
SignupForm.submitError: There was a problem signing up. Please try again or contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>
SignupForm.signupOTPTooltip: This method will not require you to enter a password each time you login. Instead the system will send a secure One Time Password (OTP) to your email address which you can then use to logon for the duration the OTP is valid.
SignupForm.checkYourEmail: We have emailed you a passcode. If you can't see it in your inbox, try checking your junk / spam folder. Altertively you can request another by clicking on the refresh button.
SignupForm.noVerificationCode: You need a verification code to signup. This should have been provided to you via an invitation link. Please contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>
SignupForm.verificationExpired: The verification code provided has expired. Please contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>
SignupForm.noDataVerification: Could not find any data for this verification code. Please contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>
SignupForm.getByInviteCodeError: There has been a problem getting your details. Please contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>

SignupFormResearcher.title: Researcher sign up
SignupFormResearcher.noData: There has been an issue getting some of the required information for the sign up process. Please contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>

Cv.fileScanError: Your CV may have a virus

NotificationsMenu.orcIdSuccessDescription: Employment, educaton and qualifications has been gathered from your ORCiD profile. You will need to reload the page to see the updates.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.consentScrape: I consent to the Registry using information I provide to gather my historical experience
Profile.consentScrapeAriaLabel: Gather my historical experience as a Researcher
Profile.submitError: There was a problem updating your details. Please try again or contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>
Profile.cvUploadFailed: There was a problem uploading your CV. Please check the file size and try again or alternativley contact us at <contactLink></contactLink>
Profile.profileCompletedDescription: You have completed all the mandatory fields required for your profile to be considered 'complete'. This will be flagged to Data Custodians when they view your user details.

ProfileCompleteStatus.uniqueIdPopup: Your unique id is used by Data Custodians to identify who you are.
ProfileCompleteStatus.profileNotCompletePopup: Your user profile is not "complete". This will be visible to Data Custodians and your organisation. Depending on their policies it may prevent you from accessing available research data.

UserCompleteStatus.profileNotCompletePopup: This user's profile is not "complete". They may not have provided some required by your policies. Please check the information below.

LoginForm.title: Login
LoginForm.loginDetailsIncorrect: Your login details are incorrect, please check them and try again.

LoginForm.successfulRegister: You have successfully registered for the Researcher Registry.

RequestError.404Description: We tried to find the selected resource but it was unavailable, please contact us via the form in the footer.
RequestError.401Description: We tried to query the selected resource but you do not have permission to access it, please contact us via the form in the footer.
RequestError.400Description: There was something wrong with the issued request, please contact us via the form in the footer.
RequestError.403Description: We tried to query the selected resource but it is forbidden, please contact us via the form in the footer.
RequestError.500Description: We tried to query the selected resource but there seems to be an issue on the server, please contact us via the form in the footer.

Auth.notAllowed: You are not allowed to access thie page. If you think this is incorrect please contacts us at <contactLink></contactLink>

Administration.issuerInviteBody: Invite Data Custodians to use the SOURSD System

Administration.systemConfigSubtitle: Parameters are in the form of NameValue pairs
